column5: What is the going rate these days for a dozen minnows and a pound of leaches?Thanks!
I just bought 11 lbs. of jumbo leeches in Alberta and paid $39/lb. Can. If the bait is good, a couple or three bucks a pound isn't worth worrying about.
anybody know where you can get jumbo leeches between fort frances and ear falls. not real concerned about the cost but would like to get better leeches than in the past.
Quinn,,,,there is an excellent bait shop right in Ft Francis right on Rainey Lake. Sells all the leeches you want
